page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT IN THE VILLAGE
page.content: 1/3 of the people who live in the village work in the village. The sort of work they do is: building <lots of people have extensions put on their home>. Gardening, some people who have big gardens and are rich have gardeners.There are men who drive round the village selling goods to people. Some people do farming. It is very hard work and they don't get paid very much money but they get a house free of rent. A lady from the village runs the post office two afternoons a week in an outhouse behind the vicerage. Some mothers do part time cleaning. Several fathers work at Stansted airport and in Bishops Stortford or London. Some Dads work at the Brewery lifting barrels and brewing beer.
